Measure.name: NumberofServicesperitem
Measure.description: SPI, the number of services ports per item, is the ratio between the number of Services interfaces and the number of component items (including the component implementations) in the java Modelio model, or more formally : SPI = NCS / (NCI + NIM). It provides, allong with the SPC metric (number of services per components), hints about the granularity of the modelled architecture.

references.measureRef: Number of Component items and Implementation
